citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 5:15 pm to 5:45 pm
on March 3, 2022. During that time the inspector knocked on doors, called the phone number on file leaving a message,
and left a leave behind flyer.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 5:15 pm to 5:45 pm 
on March 3, 2022. During that time the inspector knocked on doors, called the phone number on file leaving a message, 
and left a leave behind flyer. 
 
 
 
End Section
